sense.gloss: good place not many people know about, great little-known spot, good out-of-the-way place, well-kept secret, hidden gem of a place

sdata.j: そのレストランはニューヨークの↑楽↑↓たの↓しい↑穴場↑↓|あなば|↓ですよ。
sdata.e: The restaurant is a pleasant out-of-the-way spot in New York.

sdata.j: この↑温泉↑↓おんせん↓は↑穴場↑↓|あなば|↓だね。
sdata.e: This hot spring is a great find.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑小↑↓ちい↓さい↑穴場↑↓|あなば|↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけて↑稼↑↓かせ↓ぐのが↑得意↑↓とくい↓です。
sdata.e: He's adept at jumping into profitable niches.
